text:
Hey Heather, just started working on this again sometime back and we were doing one thing fundamentally wrong
I was using the CustomMsg.iss file to generate the islu files but there is a separate format for the islu/isl files
Thanks for the suggestion on reading up the documentation
is helping massively!
